text: I just need to get this off my chest to people who won t judge meit s been an awful week  i ve had problems with depression and anxiety before  but this week has been so overwhelming for me that i m not sure I can push through another day  I had a terrible breakup  a relationship of almost four years to a guy I wanted to marry  and today I had a massive blowout argument with my mother  who I still live with  and now she s kicking me out in   days  she relocated the whole family to southern california  and now I need to somehow find a place to live with no credit  no car  and with a  hr job  If you know southern california  you know i m f ed these problems probably pale in the light of what most of you are facing  but I feel so overwhelmed that I don t know if I can even survive tonight  I have contemplated and even planned suicide before but never went through with it  there is no feasible way for me to continue being alive  I literally cannot afford to be alive here in   days  I have no car and no place to live  I have no friends in this state because of the relocation  Even then  i don t have many friends to begin with   the fear and overwhelming sense of dread I have are completely taking over  i can almost physically feel the depression and urge to end my life in my chest  I am so scared of being homeless and i feel so alone  I have been contemplating the act for hours   I probably won t go through with it  There are no medications in the medicine cabinet I can feasibly use  and i don t want my parents to have to clean anything when i m gone  I can t put them through that along with my death   I guess i m just posting because i can t say this to anyone else  i m so terrified  i am so alone
